summary.span: 使用自定义文本布局客户端提供用于为文本设置格式及断开文本行的服务。

span.span: Provides services for formatting text and breaking text lines using a custom text layout client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]提供服务，用于设置文本格式和换行的文本引擎。 is the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] text engine that provides services for formatting text and breaking text lines. 可以处理不同的文本字符格式和段落样式，并提供对国际文本布局的支持。 can handle different text character formats and paragraph styles, and includes support for international text layout. 与传统的文本不同[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api](~/includes/tlasharptla-api-md.md)]、与通过回调方法的一组文本布局客户端交互。Unlike a traditional text [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api](~/includes/tlasharptla-api-md.md)], the interacts with a text layout client through a set of callback methods. 它要求客户端提供这些方法的实现中类。It requires the client to provide these methods in an implementation of the class. 下图说明文本格式化程序客户端和文本布局客户端的交互。The following diagram illustrates the interaction of the text formatter client and the text layout client. ![文本布局客户端和 TextFormatter
